accessToggle.public: Note will be visible to anyone with access to the document.
accessToggle.collaborator: Note will be visible to anyone who can edit this document.
accessToggle.private: Note will be visible to you alone.

accessIcon.privateExplanation: Only you can view this document
accessIcon.organizationExplanation: Only members of your organization can view this document
accessIcon.publicExplanation: Anyone can search and view this document

dialogAccessDialog.changeAccess: Change access for {n, plural, one {document} other {# documents}}
dialogAccessDialog.selectAccess: Select an access level for the {n, plural, one {selected document} other {# selected documents}}
dialogAccessDialog.publicDesc: Anyone on the internet can view the document.
dialogAccessDialog.verifiedHelp: Only verified users or members of verified organizations can make uploaded documents public. If you're a journalist or otherwise work in publishing vetted materials to inform the public, learn more and request verification here.
dialogAccessDialog.privateToOrg: You can’t change the access level to “Private to your organization” because {n, plural, one {this document is} other {one or more documents are}} associated with your individual account, not an organization. To add {n, plural, one {it} other {them}} to an organization, select {n, plural, one {it} other {them}} from the management view and click “Change Owner.” You can join or create an organization on this page.
dialogAccessDialog.privateDesc: Only people with explicit permission (via collaboration) have access.
dialogAccessDialog.organizationDesc: Only the people in your organization have access.
dialogAccessDialog.scheduleHelp: This document will be made public at the given date and time.  Publication time is local{timezone}.
dialogAccessDialog.noindexTitle: Hide from search engines and DocumentCloud search
dialogAccessDialog.noindexHelp: If you enable this option, search engines like Google's will be told they should not index this document. Also, the document will not appear in searches from DocumentCloud for users that are not logged in.
dialogAccessDialog.unchanged: Access is unchanged. Select a different access level.
dialogAccessDialog.future: Must select a time in the future
dialogAccessDialog.changeNoindex: Change visibility to search engines and DocumentCloud search for {n, plural, one {document} other {# documents}}

dialogCollaboratorDialog.confirmMsg: Proceeding will remove {name} from {title}. Do you wish to continue?
dialogCollaboratorDialog.invite: Put in the email of an existing DocumentCloud user below. If they don't have an account, have them register here for free, and then ask them to log in to DocumentCloud at least once.
dialogCollaboratorDialog.adminHelp: Collaborators can edit this project and its documents
dialogCollaboratorDialog.editHelp: Collaborators can edit documents in this project
dialogCollaboratorDialog.viewHelp: Collaborators can view documents in this project
dialogCollaboratorDialog.empty: You have not yet added any collaborators to this project. Invite collaborators to grant other users access to the documents shared in this project. You can control whether collaborators have access to view/edit the project’s documents or be an admin with permissions to invite other users and edit the project itself.
dialogCollaboratorDialog.name: Name

dialogDataDialog.removeMsg: Proceeding will remove the {key}{value} data point from the specified documents. Do you wish to continue?
dialogDataDialog.addData: Add Data for {n, plural, one {Document} other {# Documents}}
dialogDataDialog.tagInfo: Add custom tags to categorize your documents.
dialogDataDialog.keyValueInfo: Add custom key / value pairs for precise categorization of your documents.
dialogDataDialog.keyInvalid: Keys can only contain letters, numbers, underscores (_), and dashes (-)
dialogDataDialog.emptyMsg: You have not yet added any data to the specified documents. Add tags and key/value pairs to categorize and organize your documents. You can filter and search on document data to give you powerful control over document management.

dialogReprocessDialog.title: Confirm reprocess
dialogReprocessDialog.reprocessDocs: Proceeding will force the {n, plural, one {selected document} other {# selected documents}} to reprocess page and image text. Do you wish to continue?
dialogReprocessDialog.reprocessSingleDoc: Proceeding will force the document to reprocess page and image text. Do you wish to continue?

dialogDeleteDialog.title: Confirm reprocess
dialogDeleteDialog.deleteDocs: Proceeding will permanently delete the {n, plural, one {selected document} other {# selected documents}}. Do you wish to continue?

dialogCancelProcessingDialog.title: Cancel processing
dialogCancelProcessingDialog.deleteDocs: Proceeding will force the {n, plural, one {selected document} other {# selected documents}} to stop processing. After processing has been stopped, an error will show after which you can “Force Reprocess” or delete the {n, plural, one {document} other {documents}} using the Edit menu. Do you wish to continue?

dialogDiagnosticDialog.staffOnlyInfo: Staff-only info for selected {n, plural, one {document} other {# documents}}
dialogDiagnosticDialog.title: Title

dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.respOnHelp: Fill the width of the article container (usually works best)
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.respOffHelp: The document will fit the sizes specified below
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.widthAuto: Will fill the available space if the document is set to responsive, otherwise defaults to 700px
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.widthFixed: Set a maximum width if the document is responsive, or set a fixed size if not responsive
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.heightAuto: The height is based on the size of the document, with no maximum size. If responsive, will be set to the height of the browser window minus 100px
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.heightFixed: Set a maximum height if the document is responsive, or set a fixed size if not responsive
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.sbResponsiveHelp: Show sidebar automatically on large screens and hide on mobile devices. In embed mode, the sidebar will be hidden
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.tVisibleHelp: Display the title and attribution in the header of the viewer
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.tHiddenHelp: Hide the title in the header of the viewer (still visible in the sidebar)
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.plVisibleHelp: Show a link to the raw PDF document in the sidebar
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.plHiddenHelp: Hide the sidebar PDF link (file is still accessible if the URL is known)
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.fsVisibleHelp: Show a fullscreen icon in the bottom-right corner
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.tmVisibleHelp: Show an option to view the document’s text in the view dropdown
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.cbfUserAndOrgHelp: Show a document’s attribution as the user name followed by the organization
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.cbfOrgOnlyHelp: Attribute the document to just the organization
dialogDocumentEmbedDialog.embedDesc: Copy the HTML code to embed this document within an article

dialogDocumentInformationDialog.editInformation: Edit Information for {n, plural, one {document} other {# documents}}

dialogAddonDispatchDialog.setAddonParameters: Set the parameters for your chosen add-on to run on {n, plural, one {document} other {# documents}}

dialogRedactDialog.title: Confirm redactions
dialogRedactDialog.description: Are you sure you wish to redact the current document? If you continue, the document viewer will be inaccessible temporarily while the document reprocesses with the redactions in place. This change is irreversible.

dialogModifyDialog.title: Apply modifications
dialogModifyDialog.description: Are you sure you wish to modify the current document? If you continue, the document viewer will be inaccessible temporarily while the document reprocesses with the modifications. This change is irreversible.
dialogModifyDialog.closeWarning: You will lose all your unapplied modifications. Are you sure you want to proceed?

dialogDeleteNoteDialog.title: Confirm delete
dialogDeleteNoteDialog.description: Are you sure you wish to delete the current note?

dialogEditSectionsDialog.proceedingWillRemove: Proceeding will remove the specified section (p. {page} {title}). Do you wish to continue?
dialogEditSectionsDialog.manageSections: Manage sections to organize your document with a table of contents.
dialogEditSectionsDialog.empty: You have not added any sections
dialogEditSectionsDialog.title: Title
dialogEditSectionsDialog.updateTitle: Enter a new title or page number
dialogEditSectionsDialog.uniquePageNumber: You must enter a unique page number

dialogEmbedDialog.makingPublic: The document is currently being made public. This may take a minute or two.
dialogEmbedDialog.wouldMakePublic: Would you like to make this document public before sharing?
dialogEmbedDialog.notPublic: The document is not currently public. If you embed or link it, only you and collaborators will be able to view it until it is made public. Click below when you’re ready to publish this document to the public.
dialogEmbedDialog.selectShareHelp: Choose whether to share the entire document or just a page or note.
dialogEmbedDialog.shareDocHelp: Link or embed the entire document. (This is the most commonly used share option.)
dialogEmbedDialog.sharePageHelp: Link or embed a single page of the document. Useful for highlighting a page excerpt.
dialogEmbedDialog.shareNoteHelpHasNote: Link or embed a note within the document. Useful for highlighting a region of a page.
dialogEmbedDialog.shareNoteHelpNoNote: Once you add notes to the document, use this feature to link or embed them.

dialogNoteEmbedDialog.embedDesc: Copy the HTML code to embed this note within an article or post:

dialogPageEmbedDialog.embedDesc: Copy the HTML code to embed this page within an article or post:
dialogPageEmbedDialog.enterPageNumber: Enter the page number to embed:

dialogProjectAccessDialog.selectAccess: Select an access level below for {name} in {title}
dialogProjectAccessDialog.adminHelp: This collaborator can edit this project and its documents. The collaborator can invite users, delete users, and remove the project.
dialogProjectAccessDialog.editHelp: This collaborator can edit documents in this project but cannot edit the project itself.
dialogProjectAccessDialog.viewHelp: This collaborator can view documents in this project but cannot edit them or the project.
dialogProjectAccessDialog.invalidAccess: Access is already set to {access}. Select a different access level.

dialogOwnerDialog.changeOwner: Change owner for {n, plural, one {document} other {# documents}}
dialogOwnerDialog.accessWarning: Warning: You may lose access to the specified {n, plural, one {document} other {# documents}} as a result of changing the document owner

dialogProjectDialog.deleteProject: Are you sure you want to delete this project ({project})?
dialogProjectDialog.title: Title...

dialogProjectEmbedDialog.embedDesc: Copy the HTML code to embed this document within an article or post:
dialogProjectEmbedDialog.cannotEmbed: Cannot embed this project, as it does not appear to exist.

image.error: An error occurred. Try refreshing the page

omniselect.noResults: No results. Click to clear filter.

shareOptions.errorText: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
shareOptions.addShortcode: Add this shortcode to your WordPress content —

specialMessage.contactUs: Contact us with bug reports, questions, and suggestions.

uploadOptions.tesseract: Tesseract is an open source OCR engine available free to all DocumentCloud accounts.
uploadOptions.textractPremium: Textract is a more powerful OCR engine that can better handle messy text, handwriting and fuzzy scans. It is a premium feature available on Professional and Organization plans. Learn more or sign up.
uploadOptions.creditHelpText: Selecting Textract will cost one AI Credit per page in the document.  If you go over, the document will fall back to using Tesseract.  You are currently working on behalf of {organization} and have {n, plural, one {# credit} other {# credits}} left.

actionBar.selectDocs: Select some documents to reveal edit actions
actionBar.noPerms: You do not have permission to edit all of the selected documents

documents.mustBeVerified: You must be a verified journalist to upload documents

document.processingError: An error occurred trying to process your document

mainContainer.errorMsg: We could not reach the DocumentCloud server. Please try refreshing the page later.

metaFields.titleFieldInvalidSameName: The document already has this name

projectsMenu.selectDocs: Select documents to place them in projects
projectsMenu.createProj: Create a project to organize and share documents

addonsMenu.selectDocs: Select documents to dispatch them in add-ons
addonsMenu.createAddon: Choose more documents to use add-ons
addonsMenu.addonRuns: See past and future Add-On runs

noDocuments.queryNoResults: Your search query returned no results. Try again with a broader search query.
noDocuments.verify1: Note that currently your account is not verified to upload. You can search through the public repository, organize documents you're interested in into projects, leave private notes, and collaborate on editing and annotating documents other users invite you to.
noDocuments.verify2: If you’d like to upload or publish documents and you're a working journalist or other organization interested in publishing primary source materials in the public interest, you'll need to have your account verified or added to a verified organization. This is a simple process:
noDocuments.verify3: First, see if your organization already exists and, if you find it, click "Request to Join" on its page.
noDocuments.verify4: If your organization has not been verified yet, or if you're a freelancer, request verification here. Requests usually take two business days to process.
noDocuments.upload1: Upload a document file to get started using DocumentCloud. You can drag the file into this window, or click on the blue “Upload” button above.
noDocuments.upload2: Once you upload a file, DocumentCloud will process the document and extract its contents. It may take a few minutes for this to complete, but once it’s done your document will be optimized for analysis and sharing on the web.

searchBar.tips: Search tips: add filters by typing user:, project:, or organization:, etc. Use sort: to order results.

projects.createProject: Create your first project by clicking “New Project” above.

uploadDialog.selectDocument: Select or drag a document to begin the document upload process. You will then be able to edit document information.
uploadDialog.pdfSizeWarning: You can only upload PDF files under {size}.
uploadDialog.nonPdfSizeWarning: You can only upload non-PDF document files under {size}.
uploadDialog.fileReady: {n, plural, one {file} other {files}} ready to upload
uploadDialog.fileLimitWarning: You can only upload {limit} files at once.
uploadDialog.collabMsg: Document will be visible to your organization.
uploadDialog.privateMsg: Document will be visible to you alone.
uploadDialog.submitting: Almost done... submitting uploaded files for processing ({percent})
uploadDialog.pleaseLeaveOpen: Please leave this page open while your documents upload. This dialog will automatically close when they have finished uploading.
uploadDialog.errorMsg: We failed to {errorMessage}. Please try again later.
uploadDialog.dragDropMore: Drag and drop additional files here

embedPage.viewDoc: View entire {title} on DocumentCloud in new window or tab
embedPage.gotoDocCloud: Go to DocumentCloud in new window or tab

entities.totalEntityResult: {n, plural, one {# total entity result} other {# total entity results}}
entities.noKG: Does not have a knowledge graph ID
entities.noWiki: Does not have a Wikipedia URL
entities.occurrence: {n, plural, zero {} one {# occurrence} other {# occurrences}}
entities.welcome: Welcome to entity extraction! This feature is very much in progress but we want it in your hands early to welcome any feedback you might have.
entities.manual: Right now the process for extracting entities is manual. This document has not had entities extracted yet, so click below to get started.
entities.noEntities: There are no entities. This could happen if the document doesn’t have text, is non-English (only English is supported for now), or some error occurred.

home.about: DocumentCloud is an all-in-one platform for documents: upload, organize, analyze, annotate, search, and embed.

annotation.title: Note Title
annotation.noTitle: Enter a title for the note
annotation.org: This note is only visible to you and others with edit access to this document
annotation.private: This private note is only visible to you

annotatePane.desc: Highlight a portion of the page, or click between pages to create a note.

modifyPane.pagesSelected: {n, plural, one {# Page} other {# Pages}} Selected
modifyPane.insertPages: Insert {n, plural, one {# Page} other {# Pages}}
modifyPane.pagesPending: {n, plural, one {# Page} other {# Pages}} Pending Insertion
modifyPane.insertBegin: Insert {n, plural, one {# page} other {# pages}} at beginning.
modifyPane.insertEnd: Insert {n, plural, one {# page} other {# pages}} at end.
modifyPane.insertBetween: Insert {n, plural, one {# page} other {# pages}} in between page {p0} and {p1}.
modifyPane.click: Click in-between pages below to mark where to paste {n, plural, one {# page} other {# pages}}.
modifyPane.select: Select pages below to apply modifications (page rotation, rearranging, and deletion). Click in-between pages to insert.

redactPane.desc: Click and drag to draw a black rectangle over each portion of the document you’d like to redact. Associated text will be removed when you save your redactions.

searchPane.yourQuery: Your query {search} was found on {n, plural, one {# page} other {# pages}}

selectNotePane.desc: Select the note that you want to share.

searchResults.resultPages: {results, plural, one {# result} other {# results}} across {pages, plural, one {# page} other {# pages}}
searchResults.noSearchResults: No search results. Try again with a broader query.

sidebar.shareDesc: Create an embed or share on social media.
sidebar.annotateDesc: Leave a public, private or shared note, which can be embedded within an article.
sidebar.redactDesc: Create redactions on the document to hide text. The document will reprocess afterwards.
sidebar.modifyDesc: Rearrange, rotate, delete, insert, and split pages.
sidebar.infoDesc: Modify document information like description and related URL.
sidebar.dataDesc: Add tags and key/value pairs to categorize your document.
sidebar.sectionsDesc: Add sections to organize your document with a table of contents.
sidebar.privateNoteDesc: Leave a public, private or shared note, which can be embedded within an article.

viewer.notFoundDesc: The document you requested either does not exist or you lack permission to access it
viewer.processingDesc: The document you requested is processing and will automatically refresh when it is ready
viewer.errorDesc: A processing error has been encountered in the document you requested
viewer.accessibleDesc: The document you requested is still processing or you lack permission to access to it

addonDispatchDialog.select: Select which documents you’d like to run this Add-On against:
addonDispatchDialog.queryNoSelected: This Add-On will try to run against the {n, plural, one {# document} other {# documents}} currently included in your search results. To run it against only selected documents, cancel this and select some, then select the Add-On again.
addonDispatchDialog.noSelected: You must select some documents to run against.  Cancel this and select some, then select the Add-On again.
addonDispatchDialog.runSelected: This Add-On will try to run against the {n, plural, one {# currently selected document} other {# currently selected documents}}.
addonDispatchDialog.runQuery: This Add-On will try to run against the {n, plural, one {# document} other {# documents}} currently included in your search results.
addonDispatchDialog.labelSelected: The {n, plural, one {# currently selected document} other {# currently selected documents}}
addonDispatchDialog.labelQuery: The {n, plural, one {# document} other {# documents}} from the current search results
addonDispatchDialog.shareClipboardSuccess: Copied add-on URL to your clipboard

addonBrowserDialog.title: Browse Add-Ons
addonBrowserDialog.subtitle: Free automations, shortcuts, and power-ups from the DocumentCloud community

history.empty: Previous add-on runs will appear here

uploadEmailDialog.bodyText:
You can upload documents to your account by sending them to to a special email address as attachments. For security reasons, this email is only shown to you once. Please copy it to a secure location: It will accept attachments from any email account. You can generate a new upload address at any time (which will disable the old one) or turn off this feature entirely. Documents are uploaded as private.

We’d love your feedback and to hear about creative use cases at info@documentcloud.org.
uploadEmailDialog.destroyMsg: Any upload email address has been removed from your account.
